synopsis: This debut gem from Eskil Vogt follows Ingrid who, having recently lost her sight, exists only in her apartment with her thoughts as a means of escape…
description: Ingrid has recently lost her sight. She lives with her architect husband Morten in a beautiful apartment building, which she has trapped herself inside. Refusing to step outside, her only connections to the outside world are the dreams and fantasies with which she fills her days. These thoughts soon threaten to overthrow the comfortable cage Ingrid has put herself in and force her to look deeper inside herself for an answer for her problems.
title: Blind
